Lead time for a

text.#text:
A rule issued under this subsection must have the net
			 effect of improving safety.

A rule issued under this subsection shall be
			 considered a consumer product safety standard issued by the Commission under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 9 of the Consumer Product Safety Act

header.#text:
False or
			 misleading claims with respect to athletic sporting activity equipment

text.#text:
It is unlawful for any person to sell, or offer for
			 sale, in interstate commerce, or import into the United States for the purpose
			 of selling or offering for sale, any item or equipment intended, designed, or
			 offered for use by an individual engaged in any athletic sporting activity,
			 whether professional or amateur, for which the seller or importer, or any
			 person acting on behalf of the seller or importer, makes any false or
			 misleading claim with respect to the safety benefits of such item.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
